verses.verse: וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as made בְּצַלְאֵ֛ל <S%H1212><s%> be-tzal-'El And Bezaleel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָרֹ֖ן <S%H727><s%> ha-'a-Ron the ark עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> shit-Tim; [of] shittim אַמָּתַ֨יִם <S%H520><s%> 'am-ma-Ta-yim two cubits וָחֵ֜צִי <S%H2677><s%> va-Che-tzi and a half אָרְכּ֗וֹ <S%H753><s%> a-re-Ko, [was] the length וְאַמָּ֤ה <S%H520><s%> ve-'am-Mah of it and a cubit וָחֵ֙צִי֙ <S%H2677><s%> va-Che-tzi and a half רָחְבּ֔וֹ <S%H7341><s%> ra-che-Bo, the breadth וְאַמָּ֥ה <S%H520><s%> ve-'am-Mah of it and a cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <S%H2677><s%> va-Che-tzi and a half קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6967><s%> ko-ma-To. the height

וַיְצַפֵּ֛הוּ <S%H6823><s%> vay-tzap-Pe-hu And he overlaid זָהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav gold טָה֖וֹר <S%H2889><s%> ta-Hor it with pure מִבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> mib-Ba-yit within וּמִח֑וּץ <S%H2351><s%> u-mi-Chutz; and without וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as and made ל֛וֹ lo זֵ֥ר <S%H2213><s%> zer a crown זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav of gold סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. to it round about

וַיִּצֹ֣ק <S%H3332><s%> vai-yi-Tzok And he cast ל֗וֹ lo, אַרְבַּע֙ <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' for it four טַבְּעֹ֣ת <S%H2885><s%> tab-be-'Ot rings זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav, of gold עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' [to be set] by the four פַּעֲמֹתָ֑יו <S%H6471><s%> pa-'a-mo-Tav; corners וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Tei of it even two טַבָּעֹ֗ת <S%H2885><s%> tab-ba-'Ot, rings עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and צַלְעוֹ֙ <S%H6763><s%> tzal-'O side הָֽאֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chat, upon the one וּשְׁתֵּי֙ <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Tei of it and two טַבָּע֔וֹת <S%H2885><s%> tab-ba-'ot, rings עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and צַלְע֖וֹ <S%H6763><s%> tzal-'O side הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit. upon the other
